title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel hanging from long braided cord with area of attached hanging clusters of tiny braided balls. Cord splits into smaller braids which attach to flattened ball shape core which is braided over with linen yarns worked in groups for a basket-weave effect. From the base hangs one braided element.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-54.
